[{'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'ResearchDatabase.get_reports', 'description': 'Get research reports on a specific topic within the last year', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the topic of the research reports'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'reports', 'description': 'a list of research reports'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解商业银行的数字化转型。首先，获取最近一年内关于商业银行数字化转型的研究报告。然后，分析这些报告中提到的主要转型策略。接着，获取中国银行近期的数字化转型数据，并分析其转型策略的实施情况。最后，提供一些关于如何加速数字化转型的建议。
获取最近一年内关于商业银行数字化转型的研究报告
